casebody.data:
STATE
v.
HENDERSON 1987-0447 Supreme Court of Ohio. October 10, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

On appellee's motion to set execution date. Motion granted. Jerome Henderson's sentence shall be carried into execution by the warden of the Southern Ohio Correctional Facility or, in his absence, by the deputy warden on Thursday, September 14, 2023, in accordance with the statutes so provided.

O'Connor, C.J., and O'Donnell, Kennedy, French, Fischer, DeWine, and DeGenaro, JJ., concur.
